testcase.name: Place Order as PM and reject order and verify order rejection:[OrderApproval]
testcase.system-out: Given I launch the application as a Partner Manager[UserInformation]........passed Then I add a product to the cart............................................passed Then I logout from the application..........................................passed Given I launch the application as a Finance Manager.........................passed Then I reject the product that has been ordered.............................passed Then I logout from the application..........................................passed Given I launch the application as a Partner Manager.........................passed Then I should see the Product that has been ordered is rejected.............passed Then I logout from the application..........................................passed
